mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STSBOOT.EMP (EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO) VALUES(#{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, #{hiredate}, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptno})
mapper.update: update emp set ename = #{ename}, job = #{job}, mgr = #{mgr}, hiredate = #{hiredate}, sal = #{sal}, comm = #{comm}, deptno = #{deptno} where empno = #{empno}
